title: Help me finish my T206 NY Giants Sub set
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Help me finish my T206 NY Giants Sub set
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff W.
I am down to the final cards for my T206 NY Giants Sub Set. Here are the cards I am looking for in PSA 2-3 or SGC  equivalent:

Red Ames Portrait
Larry Doyle Throwing
Rube Marquard Hands at thighs
John McGraw Finger in air
Red Murray Portrait

Please send me an email if you have any of these for sale!

Jeff Williams
jwilliams81@mac.com
